job.title: Software Engineer
job.industry: Commercial Real Estate,Information Technology and Services,Research
job.description: Software Engineer<br><br><strong><u>Job Description<br><br></u></strong>CoStar delivers real-time, verified commercial real estate data that helps clients confidently spot great opportunities and make smart choices ahead of competitors. By combining the power of CoStar’s independent research organization – the industry’s largest – with global data delivery, software, and application solutions, clients can act on opportunities with confidence.<br><br>CoStar’s software developers build products that facilitate 86% of commercial real estate transactions in the United States. These transactions range from a small business owner leasing their first office space to a large multi-national buying a new headquarters campus. On any given day our developers are building products that manage nearly a trillion dollars of potential real estate transactions.<br><br><strong><u>RESPONSIBILITIES (Bullet Points Outlining Top Requirements Of The Role)<br></u></strong><ul><li>Build big, distributed, API-driven systems for tens of thousands of users</li><li>Produce bullet-proof code that is robust, efficient and maintainable; our primary tools are C#, .NET Framework, React, JavaScript, AngularJS, JSON, SQL Server</li><li>Drive and lead software design, development standards, code reviews.</li><li>Continually evaluate emerging technologies to identify opportunities, trends, and best practices that can be leveraged to strength CoStar’s technology platform and develop practices.<br><br></li></ul><strong><u>Qualifications<br></u></strong><ul><li>3+ years experience in a C# and .NET Framework</li><li>3+ years experience working in Javascript</li><li>Demonstrated experience in architecting, designing and building large scale distributed, services-oriented systems and web applications in an agile environment</li><li>3+ years data modeling experience</li><li>Bachelor’s Degree<br><br></li></ul><strong><u>PREFERRED QUALIFCATIONS AND SKILLS (Nice To Haves)<br></u></strong><ul><li>Strong communication skills (to both business and technical partners)</li><li>Bachelor’s Degree </li><li>Knowledge of SQL experience</li><li>Data modeling experience from conceptual, logical and physical designs</li><li>Experience with RESTful web services<br><br></li></ul>CoStar Group is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer; we maintain a drug-free workplace and perform pre-employment substance abuse testing
